author: Ubisoft
description: Embark on a new adventure as Naoe and Yasuke and travel to the mysterious Island of Awaji beyond Osaka Bay.
title: The Claws of Awaji expansion is available now! #AssassinsCreedShadows

author: Ubisoft
description:
It’s been too long, Sam Fisher. From the writer of John Wick comes TOM CLANCY’S SPLINTER CELL: DEATHWATCH, a thrilling new animated series based on the acclaimed Ubisoft video game franchise, only on Netflix October 14.

From Derek Kolstad, the writer behind the John Wick franchise, comes the first-ever adaptation of the acclaimed stealth video game franchise, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell. After a long absence from the field, legendary agent Sam Fisher (Liev Schreiber) is drawn back into action when a wounded young operative (Kirby Howell-Baptiste) seeks his help. TOM CLANCY'S SPLINTER CELL: DEATHWATCH will be available worldwide on October 14 on Netflix.

About Ubisoft Film & Television

Ubisoft Film & Television’s mission is to bring Ubisoft’s award-winning games into new areas of entertainment and to create original stories set in the world, culture, and community of gaming. All four seasons of the division’s first original series, Mythic Quest, and spin-off anthology series Side Que
title: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch | Official Trailer | Netflix

author: Ubisoft
description:
Get ready for Claws of Awaji launch and get 40% OFF the main game now:  https://ubi.li/rEDXA

Discover 10h+ of new content! Travel to the Island of Awaji, a new region of mysterious beauty and hidden danger. Navigate its desolate paths, evade ambushes, and destabilize enemy operations across the island. Available now.

Learn more: https://www.assassincreed.com/shadows
Watch more: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBnrd5k2F2IOOjoz62wdQntPrz6D0xjWq

Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@assassinscreed
X: https://x.com/assassinscreed

Assassin's Creed Shadows also available to buy on Steam: assassinscreed.com/shadows/steam

#Ubisoft #AssassinsCreed
